creator: AudiobookStore.com
descriptionHtml:
Download the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com audiobook app today to manage and listen to all of your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com. Simply log into the app using your website account credentials and you'll be listening in seconds!

Since 2006, AudiobookSTORE.com has been committed to delivering their audiobook listeners the highest quality audiobooks in every category, from the classics to the latest releases. With over 110,000 top selling digital audiobooks, and thousands of high demand titles added each and every week, you’re sure to find exactly what you’re looking for!

Top Service Benefits:

● Download your first audiobook for just $7.95!
● Over 110,000 top selling audiobooks in every category, and from the world’s most recognized authors!
● Purchased audiobooks are 100% yours, no strings attached.
● All audiobooks are DRM free, so you can listen through our FREE app or download to your computer and listen on any device that plays standard audio files. Even burn to CD if that’s your preferred listening media.

Top App Features:

● Cross device syncing ensures that if you listen on multiple devices your latest paused position will be synchronized between each device. Listen on your Android phone while out for a jog, resume on your iPad when relaxing at home.
● Change the playback speed using set points or fine-tune your preferred speed using a slider.
● Multiple runtime counters on the player screen show how much you’ve listened and how much remains of your active audiobook.
● Download multiple audiobooks simultaneously to your device via wifi or cellular data.
● Listen on your favorite device using the built-in speakers, earbuds, headphones, external Bluetooth speakers, and even your car using USB or Bluetooth.
● Set a sleep timer so your audiobook pauses automatically at your specified duration.
● Organize your Library quickly and efficiently, including hiding audiobooks that you’ve marked as “Read” by right-swiping them in the Library. Marking audiobooks as Read also syncs with your online AudiobookSTORE.com account Library, and vice-versa.
● Mini-player on the Library screen allows for instant access to play/pause and bookmarking features without leaving your Library screen.

Once you’ve downloaded our FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app you can enjoy your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com. Feel free to contact support for help via the in-app “Help & FAQs” section, or through the “Contact Us” page on their website.
descriptionShort: Get the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app & start listening to bestselling audiobooks!

appDetails.developerAddress:
6209 Mid Rivers Mall Dr.
Suite 303
St. Peters, MO 63304
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
After months of design, development and testing, we’re excited to bring you our completely new AudiobookSTORE.com app, rebuilt from the ground up! Follow the in-app tutorial once the update completes to discover all of these great new features and more!

>>> AS ALWAYS, if you encounter a bug or have suggestions, please contact us via the in-app Help & FAQs section. We're always quick to respond and eager to improve your app experience.

- Playback position should be more reliable

After months of design, development and testing, we’re excited to bring you our completely new AudiobookSTORE.com app, rebuilt from the ground up!

>>> AS ALWAYS, if you encounter a bug or have suggestions, please contact us via the in-app Help & FAQs section. We're always quick to respond and eager to improve your app experience.

title: Audiobooks by AudiobookSTORE

container.value:
6209 Mid Rivers Mall Dr.
Suite 303
St. Peters, MO 63304

creator: AudiobookStore.com
descriptionHtml:
Download the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com audiobook app today to manage and listen to all of your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com, as well as over 100 MILLION podcast episodes. Simply log into the app using your website account credentials and you'll be listening in seconds!

Since 2006, AudiobookSTORE.com has been committed to delivering their audiobook listeners the highest quality audiobooks in every category, from the classics to the latest releases. With over 130,000 top selling digital audiobooks, and thousands of high demand titles added each and every week, along with over 100 MILLION podcast episodes (available to members), you’re sure to find exactly what you’re looking for!

Top Service Benefits:

● Download your first audiobook for just $7.95!
● Over 130,000 top selling audiobooks in every category, and from the world’s most recognized authors!
● Members can listen to over 100 MILLION podcast episodes!
● Purchased audiobooks are 100% yours, no strings attached.
● All audiobooks are DRM free, so you can listen through our FREE app or download to your computer and listen on any device that plays standard audio files. Even burn to CD if that’s your preferred listening media.

Top App Features:

● Cross device syncing ensures that if you listen on multiple devices your latest paused position will be synchronized between each device. Listen on your Android phone while out for a jog, resume on your iPad when relaxing at home.
● Change the playback speed using set points or fine-tune your preferred speed using a slider.
● Multiple runtime counters on the player screen show how much you’ve listened and how much remains of your active audiobook.
● Download multiple audiobooks simultaneously to your device via wifi or cellular data.
● Listen on your favorite device using the built-in speakers, earbuds, headphones, external Bluetooth speakers, and even your car using USB or Bluetooth.
● Set a sleep timer so your audiobook pauses automatically at your specified duration.
● Organize your Library quickly and efficiently, including hiding audiobooks that you’ve marked as “Read” by right-swiping them in the Library. Marking audiobooks as Read also syncs with your online AudiobookSTORE.com account Library, and vice-versa.
● Mini-player on the Library screen allows for instant access to play/pause and bookmarking features without leaving your Library screen.

Once you’ve downloaded our FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app you can enjoy your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com. Feel free to contact support for help via the in-app “Help & FAQs” section, or through the “Contact Us” page on their website.
descriptionShort: Get the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app & start listening to bestselling audiobooks!

appDetails.developerAddress:
6209 Mid Rivers Mall Dr.
Suite 303
St. Peters, MO 63304
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW: Podcasts! After months of design, development and testing, we’re excited to announce that we have added Podcasts to the AudiobookSTORE.com app, FREE for FlexPass™ members!

This release also includes the ability to set different durations for rewind and fast forward, as well as several bug fixes and tweaks.

>>> AS ALWAYS, if you encounter a bug or have suggestions, please contact us via the in-app Help & FAQs section. We're always quick to respond and eager to improve your app experience.

● Organize your Library quickly and efficiently, including hiding audiobooks that you’ve marked as “Read” by right-swiping them in the Library. Marking audiobooks as Read also syncs with your online AudiobookSTORE.com account Library, and vice-versa.
● Mini-player on the Library screen allows for instant access to play/pause and bookmarking features without leaving your Library screen.

Once you’ve downloaded our FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app you can enjoy your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com. Feel free to contact support for help via the in-app “Help & FAQs” section, or through the “Contact Us” page on their website.
descriptionShort: Get the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app & start listening to bestselling audiobooks!

6209 Mid Rivers Mall Dr.
Suite 303
St. Peters, MO 63304
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: Audiobooks by AudiobookSTORE

container.value:

St. Peters, MO 63304

creator: AudiobookStore.com
descriptionHtml:
Download the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com audiobook app today to manage and listen to all of your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com, as well as over 100 MILLION podcast episodes. Simply log into the app using your website account credentials and you'll be listening in seconds!

Since 2006, AudiobookSTORE.com has been committed to delivering their audiobook listeners the highest quality audiobooks in every category, from the classics to the latest releases. With over 130,000 top selling digital audiobooks, and thousands of high demand titles added each and every week, along with over 100 MILLION podcast episodes (available to members), you’re sure to find exactly what you’re looking for!

Top Service Benefits:

● Download your first audiobook for just $7.95!
● Over 130,000 top selling audiobooks in every category, and from the world’s most recognized authors!
● Members can listen to over 100 MILLION podcast episodes!
● Purchased audiobooks are 100% yours, no strings attached.
● All audiobooks are DRM free, so you can listen through our FREE app or download to your computer and listen on any device that plays standard audio files. Even burn to CD if that’s your preferred listening media.

Top App Features:

● Cross device syncing ensures that if you listen on multiple devices your latest paused position will be synchronized between each device. Listen on your Android phone while out for a jog, resume on your iPad when relaxing at home.
● Change the playback speed using set points or fine-tune your preferred speed using a slider.
● Multiple runtime counters on the player screen show how much you’ve listened and how much remains of your active audiobook.
● Download multiple audiobooks simultaneously to your device via wifi or cellular data.
● Listen on your favorite device using the built-in speakers, earbuds, headphones, external Bluetooth speakers, and even your car using USB or Bluetooth.
● Set a sleep timer so your audiobook pauses automatically at your specified duration.
● Organize your Library quickly and efficiently, including hiding audiobooks that you’ve marked as “Read” by right-swiping them in the Library. Marking audiobooks as Read also syncs with your online AudiobookSTORE.com account Library, and vice-versa.
● Mini-player on the Library screen allows for instant access to play/pause and bookmarking features without leaving your Library screen.

Once you’ve downloaded our FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app you can enjoy your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com. Feel free to contact support for help via the in-app “Help & FAQs” section, or through the “Contact Us” page on their website.
descriptionShort: Get the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app & start listening to bestselling audiobooks!

- Bluetooth earbuds not properly fast forwarding and rewinding using their built-in controls

● Cross device syncing ensures that if you listen on multiple devices your latest paused position will be synchronized between each device. Listen on your Android phone while out for a jog, resume on your iPad when relaxing at home.
● Change the playback speed using set points or fine-tune your preferred speed using a slider.
● Multiple runtime counters on the player screen show how much you’ve listened and how much remains of your active audiobook.
● Download multiple audiobooks simultaneously to your device via wifi or cellular data.
● Listen on your favorite device using the built-in speakers, earbuds, headphones, external Bluetooth speakers, and even your car using USB or Bluetooth.
● Set a sleep timer so your audiobook pauses automatically at your specified duration.
● Organize your Library quickly and efficiently, including hiding audiobooks that you’ve marked as “Read” by right-swiping them in the Library. Marking audiobooks as Read also syncs with your online AudiobookSTORE.com account Library, and vice-versa.
● Mini-player on the Library screen allows for instant access to play/pause and bookmarking features without leaving your Library screen.

Once you’ve downloaded our FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app you can enjoy your audiobooks purchased through AudiobookSTORE.com. Feel free to contact support for help via the in-app “Help & FAQs” section, or through the “Contact Us” page on their website.
descriptionShort: Get the FREE AudiobookSTORE.com app & start listening to bestselling audiobooks!

appDetails.developerAddress:
6209 Mid Rivers Mall Dr.
Suite 303
St. Peters, MO 63304
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release is intended to resolve several device-specific bugs customers have been reporting, including freezing, player control issues, issues while using in conjunction with Google Maps, and more. If you continue to experience issues with your device, please reach out to us at customercare@audiobookstore.com so we can work with you directly to quickly resolve for your specific device and use case.
